## üåê 2. Browser Extension Installation

Use the DOT browser extension to capture screens quickly from your browser.

### üîΩ Step 1: Download the extension

Click the link to install the extension in your browser:


   <template>
     <a href="https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/dot/nhhfcmlfhpkdkdndccphmddecjedegia" target="_blank" class="btn btn-outline mt-2"> üëâ Install Extension</a>
   </template>

### ‚ûï Step 2: Add the extension

* Your browser will ask for confirmation.

* Click ‚ÄúAdd extension‚Äù to continue.

### üëÄ Step 3: Verify that the extension is active

* Make sure the DOT icon appears in your browser toolbar.

* If not, pin it using the browser‚Äôs ‚Äúpin‚Äù button.
